M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Launch
The entry point of the program.
mainGameGui(int, int, int, int) - Method in class gameElement.Game
This method is the main loop of the game; when the user click on a JButton in the grid.
MainMenu - Class in Display
This class represents the main menu of the application.
MainMenu() - Constructor for class Display.MainMenu
The constructor of the class which creates the elements of the frame.
Match - Class in gameElement
This class represents a game with several sleeve.
Match(String, String, Mode, boolean) - Constructor for class gameElement.Match
The constructor of the class which initializes the attributes.
Match(String, String, Mode, boolean, int, int, String, String) - Constructor for class gameElement.Match
The second constructor of the class, uses in the case of the continuation of a match.
MenuCommandLine - Class in Display
This class allows to print a welcome menu for the user, and add several functions for the user : The possibility to have a tutorial.
MenuCommandLine() - Constructor for class Display.MenuCommandLine
The empty constructor that set the value of the attribute dataPath.
Mode - Enum in gameElement
The possible mode for the user.
move(int, int, int, int) - Method in class gameElement.Game
This method allows to move a pawn.
